jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe Hue CC
jcr:content.browserTitle: Video effects, video filter app | Adobe Hue CC
jcr:content.metaDescription: Capture naturally occurring color and light from your surroundings and turn them into creative video filters and effects with Adobe Hue CC. Download the app today.

text_3da3.text:
Capture color. Transform video.
 
Capture inspiring color and light on your iPhone or iPad. Then save what you see as a Look to apply to your Adobe Premiere Pro CC, After Effects CC or Premiere Clip video projects.
 
Update: Adobe Hue CC features are now available as part of Adobe Capture CC.

text_66f.text: Adobe Capture CC

text_87d1.text: For iPhone and iPad

text_ae6d.text: For Android

text_145e.text:
Adobe Hue in action.
Use your iPhone, iPad or Android phone to capture color and light from the world around you — or even from photos in your camera roll or Adobe Creative Cloud account — and then use those colors as Looks to enhance your video projects.

text_985d.text:
Visualize color and light
View color and light in three-dimensional space so you can see the structure of your Look.

text_bad7.text:
Refine your Looks
Customize your Looks by using intuitive tools to shift midtones and adjust intensity.

text_4fd4.text:
Create collections
Save collections of custom Looks based on real-world scenes, and then use them to transform your video footage.

text_533f.text:
Live preview
Get the full impact of your Look by applying it to a sample image or video as you fine-tune the details.

text_bbac.text:
Adobe video app integration
Apply Looks created in Adobe Hue to Premiere Clip videos on your iPhone or iPad, or use them in Premiere Pro or After Effects projects on your desktop.

text_c99.text:
Creative Cloud connected
Save Looks to your Creative Cloud Libraries, where you can access them across apps or share them with colleagues.

text_6354.text:
Learn & Support
Learn Adobe Hue with our easy-to-follow tutorials, or find answers in the forums and FAQ.

text_21a1.text: Get started

text_1eb8.text: Common questions

text_9f60.text: Ask the community

text_c208.text: Color your scenes with any colors you see.

text_8531.text: Take inspiration from the world around you and use it to create custom Looks for your Premiere Clip, Premiere Pro CC or After Effects CC projects.

text_6605.text:
Connected to Creative Cloud.
 
The Looks you create in Adobe Hue are saved to your Creative Cloud Libraries so you can access them right away in Premiere Clip, Premiere Pro CC and After Effects CC or share them with colleagues.
 
Creative Cloud brings together the world’s best creative apps for desktop and mobile, plus more connected ways of creating and sharing.

text_f299.text:
Adobe Capture CC
Create production-ready assets anytime, anywhere.

text_2d5d.text:
Adobe After Effects CC
Cinematic visual effects and motion graphics.

text_b8f7.text:
Adobe Premiere Clip
Video editing on the go.

text_75d.text:
Adobe Premiere Pro CC
Video production and editing.
